alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 7:56AM PST until February 28 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Chesaw Road, Omak, Disautel Pass, Sherman Pass, Brewster, Nespelem, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Bridgeport, Oroville, Okanogan, Wauconda, Tonasket, Inchelium, Boulder Creek Road, and Republic. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
